black_screen_1.text: You are a journalist. You came here chasing a story… Now the story has you.

speech_bubble_1.title: You
speech_bubble_1.text: Ugh... my head. Where am I? What happened?

speech_bubble_2.title: You
speech_bubble_2.text: Is that a telephone ringing? Sounds like its coming from the study, maybe I should go check it out

objective_1.description: Find the study and answer the telephone

phone_ring_speech.title: You
phone_ring_speech.text: Who… who could that be in a place like this?

phone_call_black_screen.text: I hope you enjoy the truth you've stumbled upon. You wanted a story… now live it.

objective_find_pages.description: Search the mansion for mysterious pages

all_pages_found.title: You
all_pages_found.text: I have all the pages... but these symbols don't make any sense.

laptop_suggestion.title: You
laptop_suggestion.text: Maybe that laptop I saw earlier could help decipher them...

objective_decipher_pages.description: Use the laptop to decipher the page symbols

objective_place_pages.description: Place the deciphered pages in the correct order

collect_pages_speech.title: Inner Monologue
collect_pages_speech.text: These… look like research notes. But the symbols don't make sense.

laptop_puzzle_speech.title: Inner Monologue
laptop_puzzle_speech.text: Maybe this can decode the symbols…

fix_fuse_box_objective.description: Find the fuse box and restore power to the mansion

transition_start.title: You
transition_start.text: Something feels different... The air grows colder.

need_power.title: You
need_power.text: I need to find the fuse box and restore the power...

something_moving.title: You
something_moving.text: I hear something moving in the darkness...

fuse_box_examine.title: You
fuse_box_examine.text: I need to rewire this... carefully.

lights_restored.title: You
lights_restored.text: The lights flicker back to life. I can see again!

escape.text: You came looking for a story. Now you’ve survived one. But the house… waits for the next curious soul.

death.text: The story ends here. The house claims another victim.
